title: Can a Higher IQ Actually Hurt You?
description:
Jillian takes a look at changing the way we think about thinking to positively affect our decisions. Plus, sugar substitutes, and email questions about making the most out of My Fitness App.

Check out Jillian’s New Year sale for My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/lzN0kjLqw2

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
